content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
Celebrated my bday here with a group of 10. Ordered 2 short rib tomahawks and 2 Combo D's which was just enough food. Everything was so good and our waiter Alex made this one of our favorite KBBQ experiences. Would definitely come back.
